thread.title: Recommended from Around the Web (Week ending September 5, 2015)
thread.title_full: Recommended from Around the Web (Week ending September 5, 2015)

title: Recommended from Around the Web (Week ending September 5, 2015)
text:
September 3, 2015 Recommended from Around the Web (Week ending September 5, 2015) A roundup of the most interesting stories from other sites, collected by the staff at MIT Technology Review . 
A new science fiction movement tries to cope with climate change. —Linda Lowenthal, copy chief 
How a robot learning to play with toddlers’ toys could show the way to smarter, more useful machines. —Tom Simonite, San Francisco bureau chief 
Harvard’s most recent take on the “economic pyramid.” —J. Juniper Friedman, associate Web producer 
How reporters are using algorithms to help them tell stories. —Kyanna Sutton, senior Web producer
